General.Name: UMC Electronics Co. Ltd
General.Description: UMC Electronics Co., Ltd. provides electronic manufacturing services in Japan. The company develops pachinko amusement/pinball games; pachinko/pinball game control units; electronic circuit boards for liquid crystal displays, decorative illumination, power supply, etc.; and devices related to credit/debit cards, such as credit/debit card payment terminals and security code inputting keypads. It also provides car electronic machine parts, including AC inverters, motor drivers, electric steering locks, trunk lid sensors, indicator in the compartments, start stop converters, and other parts. The company was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Ageo, Japan.
